article_text:
Buy Photo Staff writer Shannon Mullen. Neptune, NJ Thursday, October 30, 2014 Doug Hood/Staff Photographer (Photo: Gannett)Buy Photo

Got Verizon FiOS or DISH? Tune in to Channel 3 WJLP at 5 p.m. Saturday and 9 a.m. Sunday for "Jersey Matters."

Guests this week will include APP's Jay Scott Smith discussing Gov. Chris Christie's State of the Union address and Shannon Mullen on the troubles with guardianship over seniors in New Jersey.

Catch Smith talking race on last week's "Jersey Matters" in the video below. Not displaying properly? Try refreshing your browser.

Read or Share this story: http://on.app.com/1EaVykm

article_metadata.description: "Jersey Matters" and "Another Thing" this week will include Jay Scott Smith, Shannon Mullen and Russ Zimmer.
